name: Golem (itch) (Quirky Squid Studios, Yoorp)
description:
Golem is a platforming puzzle game where you have to escape a factory.

Made for mini jam future.

Note the WEBGL version is the jam version and not the updated version.

MacOS Catalina Users:

If you are struggling to run the game, you might need to change permissions. Try running the following command from the terminal in the folder containing the app:

sudo chmod a+x "updated_mac.app"/Contents/MacOS/*

CREDITS:

Programming by @maxall4

Music By @Yoorp
